glosses: to believe, have faith (someone's abilities, chances etc.; someone's existence; the power, value etc. of something; the existence of something)

examples.translation: Do you believe/have faith in her?

glosses: to believe (someone, in something someone says/does), trust

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish اینانمق (inanmak), from Proto-Turkic *ïnan- (“to believe; trust, rely on”). Cognate with Old Turkic [script needed] (ïnan-), etc.
